nodes.text: Kaeira was a Human female who lived in the Lower City of Taris during the time of the Jedi Civil War and the Sith occupation of that world. She was a member of the Hidden Beks swoop gang and a bodyguard of its leader, Gadon Thek.
Kaeira is only encountered if the player takes the dark side choice to join the Black Vulkars and murder Gadon, subsequently killing her too.
